channel.title: How Can IATI Data Be Used By The Humanitarian Data Exchange
channel.description: The Humanitarian Data Exchange (HDX) project aims to make humanitarian data easy to find and use for analysis. How might IATI data be used by the project?

item.title: How Can IATI Data Be Used By The Humanitarian Data Exchange
item.dc:creator: zararah
item.description:
Hi - just flicking through a couple of documents from the HDX project, and IATI is actually mentioned as a potential partner for affiliation - http://docs.hdx.rwlabs.org/wp-content/uploads/HXL_Paper-forsite.pdf (Section 4, Major Decisions, page 10)

Might be worth getting in touch…? They’re using CKAN, too.

Zara

Read full topic
item.source: How Can IATI Data Be Used By The Humanitarian Data Exchange
